sql.name: dshfmyformsunpage_city
sql.item: select c801800001 from {100} order by c801842006

sql.name: dshfmyformsunpage_brand
sql.item: select distinct c801800001 as 客户品牌 from {100}

sql.name: dshfmyformsunpage_qudao
sql.item: select t.C630000018 as name ,t.C630000030 as id from {100} t where t.C630000021='2' and ((t.C630000018 like '%分公司%') or (t.C630000018 like '%区客服%') or (t.C630000018 like '%河北移动%'))
